message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $14,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's worth $12,000 to you and I'm confident it will be just as valuable for you. Let me know your thoughts!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its worth $12,000 to you. Let me know if you're willing to accept my offer.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go below $12,500. This product is worth a lot to me, and I believe it's still a great deal for you, considering its value. I'm open to discussing further, but I can't compromise any lower than that.

Hi Alice, I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11,800 for the product. I believe it's a fair compromise considering its worth $12,000 to you. Let me know if you're willing to accept my offer.
Bob, I appreciate your continued interest in the product. Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to go down to $12,200. This is a good deal for both of us, and it keeps us both happy. What do you say?

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $11,900 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its worth $12,000 to you. Let me know if you're willing to accept my offer.
